# Version 1.2.0

## Knowledge Base & Document Processing

This release focuses on enhancing knowledge management capabilities with powerful document processing features.

### ‚ú® New Features

- **Central Knowledge Base**: Store and organize company knowledge for AI agents
- **Document Upload**: Support for PDF, Word, and text document uploads
- **Vector Search**: Semantic search across your knowledge base
- **Document Parsing**: Automatic extraction and indexing of document content
- **Knowledge Sharing**: Share knowledge bases across multiple agents

### üîß Improvements

- Faster document indexing
- Improved search relevance
- Better handling of large documents
- Enhanced UI for knowledge management

### üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed document upload issues for large files
- Resolved search result ranking problems
- Fixed memory usage during document processing
